title: Fix npm audit vulnerabilities (18 total: 5 moderate, 13 high)
description: npm audit shows 18 vulnerabilities. Run npm audit fix. For remaining issues, evaluate npm audit fix --force. Document any breaking changes. Target: zero high-severity vulnerabilities.
acceptance_criteria: npm audit shows 0 high-severity vulnerabilities. All tests still pass.

comments.text: Added npm overrides for minimatch>=10.2.1. npm audit now shows 0 vulnerabilities. All 238 tests pass.
